Package model

Class ModelMandelbrot

java.lang.Object
model.ModelMandelbrot
public class ModelMandelbrot extends Object
Core model holding Mandelbrot viewport parameters, data, and undo/redo history.

  • Method Details

    • recalculate

      public void recalculate()
      Recalculates the Mandelbrot set with the current parameters. Calls the calculator and then notifies the listeners.

    • getData

      public int[][] getData()
      Returns:
      2D iteration data for the current view

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns:
      width of the current render in pixels

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Returns:
      height of the current render in pixels

    • getMinReal

      public double getMinReal()
      Returns:
      minimum real coordinate for the view window

      public double getMaxReal()
      Returns:
      maximum real coordinate for the view window

    • getMinImag

      public double getMinImag()
      Returns:
      minimum imaginary coordinate for the view window

    • getMaxImag

      public double getMaxImag()
      Returns:
      maximum imaginary coordinate for the view window

    • getMaxIterations

      public int getMaxIterations()
      Returns:
      maximum iterations configured

    • getRadiusSquared

      public double getRadiusSquared()
      Returns:
      bailout radius squared value

    • getColorMapName

      public String getColorMapName()
      Returns:
      name of the active colour map

    • getMagnification

      public double getMagnification()
      Approximate magnification relative to the first range. Handy if the UI wants to display the zoom level.
      Returns:
      magnification factor relative to the initial view

    • setMaxIterations

      public void setMaxIterations(int maxIterations)
      Updates the max number of iterations and triggers a recalculation.
      Parameters:
      maxIterations - new maximum iteration count

    • setViewWindow

      public void setViewWindow(double minReal, double maxReal, double minImag, double maxImag)
      Sets the complex plane rectangle used for rendering.
      Parameters:
      minReal - minimum real coordinate
      maxReal - maximum real coordinate
      minImag - minimum imaginary coordinate
      maxImag - maximum imaginary coordinate

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Restores the initial coordinates and settings.

    • pan

      public void pan(double deltaReal, double deltaImag)
      Moves the current view window by the specified delta values. Positive deltaReal moves the view to the right. Positive deltaImag moves the view downward (complex plane).
      Parameters:
      deltaReal - real-axis shift to apply
      deltaImag - imaginary-axis shift to apply

    • canUndo

      public boolean canUndo()
      Returns:
      whether an undo operation is available

    • canRedo

      public boolean canRedo()
      Returns:
      whether a redo operation is available

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Reverts to the previous Mandelbrot state if available.

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Reapplies a previously undone state if available.

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(File file) throws IOException
      Saves the current model parameters to a file.
      Parameters:
      file - destination file
      Throws:
      IOException - if writing fails

    • loadFromFile

      public void loadFromFile(File file) throws IOException
      Loads model parameters from a file and recalculates the set.
      Parameters:
      file - source file containing saved parameters
      Throws:
      IOException - if reading fails

      public void setColorMapName(String colorMapName)
      Updates the active colour map name and notifies listeners.
      Parameters:
      colorMapName - name of the colour map to apply
